settings.Label: Output collections
settings.Description: A comma separated list of collection URIs. Loaded documents are added to these collections.

settings.Label: Output permissions
settings.Description: A comma separated list of (role,capability) pairs to apply to loaded documents. Default: The default permissions associated with the user inserting the document. Example: -output_permissions role1,read,role2,update

settings.Label: Output URI prefix
settings.Description: URI prefix to the id specified by -output_idname. Used to construct output document URIs.

settings.Label: Output URI suffix
settings.Description: URI suffix to the id specified by -output_idname. Used to construct output document URIs.

settings.Label: Document type
settings.Description: The type of document to create when -input_file_type is documents or sequencefile. Accepted values: mixed (documents only), xml, json, text, binary. Default: mixed for documents, xml for sequencefile.

settings.Label: Input compressed
settings.Description: Whether or not the source data is compressed. Default: false.
settings.Placeholder Value: whether or not the source data is compressed

settings.Label: Namespace
settings.Description: The default namespace for all XML documents created during loading.
settings.Placeholder Value: default namespace for all XML documents created during loading

settings.Label: XML repair level
settings.Description: The degree of repair to attempt on XML documents in order to create well-formed XML. Accepted values: default,full, none. Default: default, which depends on the configured MarkLogic Server default XQuery version: In XQuery 1.0 and 1.0-ml the default is none. In XQuery 0.9-ml the default is full.

settings.Label: Thread count
settings.Description: The number of threads to spawn for concurrent loading. The total number of threads spawned by the process can be larger than this number, but this option caps the number of concurrent sessions with MarkLogic Server. Only available in local mode. Default: 4.

settings.Label: Batch size
settings.Description: The number of documents to process in a single request to MarkLogic Server. This option is ignored when you use -transform_module; a transform always sets the batch size to 1. Default: 100.
settings.Placeholder Value: default is 100; set to 1 when transform is used

groups.caption: If the selected file ends in .csv, .xls, or .xlsx, the server will assume that the input file type is "delimited_text".

settings.Label: Delimiter
settings.Description: When importing content with -input_file_type delimited_text, the delimiting character. Default: comma (,).

settings.Label: URI ID
settings.Description: When importing content -input_file_type delimited_text, the column name that contributes to the id portion of the URI for inserted documents. Default: The first column.

settings.Label: Generate URI
settings.Description: When importing content with -input_file_type delimited_text, whether or not MarkLogic Server should automatically generate document URIs. Default: false.
settings.Placeholder Value: default is false for delimited_text, true for delimited_json

settings.Label: Delimited root name
settings.Description: When importing content with -input_file_type delimited_text, the localname of the document root element. Default: root.

settings.Label: Split input
settings.Description: Whether or not to divide input data into logical chunks to support more concurrency. Only supported when -input_file_type is one of the following: delimited_text. Default: false for local mode, true for distributed mode. For details, see Improving Throughput with -split_input.
settings.Placeholder Value: whether or not to divide input data into logical chunks to support more concurrency.

settings.Label: Aggregate record element
settings.Description: When splitting an aggregate input file into multiple documents, the name of the element to use as the output document root. Default: The first child element under the root element.

settings.Label: Aggregate record namespace
settings.Description: The namespace of the element specificed by -aggregate_record_element_name. Default: No namespace.

settings.Label: URI ID
settings.Description: When splitting an aggregate input file into multiple documents, the element or attribute name within the document root to use as the document URI. Default: In local mode, hashcode-seqnum, where the hashcode is derived from the split number; in distribute mode, taskid-seqnum.
settings.Placeholder Value: name of the element from which to derive the document URI

settings.Label: Transform module
settings.Description: The path in the modules database or modules directory of a custom content transformation function installed on MarkLogic Server. This option is required to enable a custom transformation. For details, see Transforming Content During Ingestion.

settings.Label: Transform namespace
settings.Description: The namespace URI of the custom content transformation function named by -transform_function. Ignored if-transform_module is not specified. Default: no namespace. For details, see Transforming Content During Ingestion.

settings.Label: Transform param
settings.Description: Optional extra data to pass through to a custom transformation function. Ignored if -transform_module is not specified. Default: no namespace. For details, see Transforming Content During Ingestion.
